Cosmo: AI Face & Photo Editor

Brief: Step into a transformative digital beauty parlor with Cosmo, an AI-enhanced face and photo editor designed to elevate your portraits and snapshots with a touch of artificial intelligence. Cosmo offers a playful and futuristic experience, allowing users to generate vibrant avatars, reimagine their aesthetic in various art styles, and perfect their portraits with advanced editing tools. Whether for fun glimpses into the future or beautifying tweaks, Cosmo caters to every mood and style.
